title: Australian football
creator_credit: Stanley Moore, Coca-Cola and Ajax Films
brief_description: The great Australian game of football - of colorful crowds packing Melbourne Cricket Ground to watch their idols play. Players demonstrate the bounce, recovery, centre bounce, tackling, passing the ball, marking, various types of kick and the finer points of the game to youngsters at school. Includes sequences shot whilst important games were in progress.
